title: Mnemonic Generator
blurb: Offline mnemonic & diceware phrase generator — supports 1–8, 12, 16, 24, 32 words; PBKDF2-HMAC-SHA512 seed derivation; BIP39-ready.
description: A client-side, offline mnemonic generator for secure phrase creation and seed derivation. Supports short 1–8 word custom phrases and canonical 12/16/24/32 word sizes. Derives seeds via PBKDF2-HMAC-SHA512. Designed to work with local BIP39 wordlists (not included by default) and a Diceware mode. No network required once loaded; uses WebCrypto for entropy.

versions.notes: Initial public preview with custom 1–8/12/16/24/32 word support, PBKDF2 seed derivation, placeholder BIP39 integration hooks.
